Welcome to Guardians’s documentation!

Guardian is S-Fifteen Instrument’s RESTful based quantum key delivery API following ETSI Document 014. The intent of this documentation is 3 fold

  1. User documntation on the necessary certificates and usage of Guardian as a client (SAE)

  2. Documentation for access controller to authorise new clients(SAEs) to be able to access Guardian

  3. Administrator documentation for setting up and adding new nodes (KMEs) into the network.
